description: collection of frames extracted from videos uploaded by oriane app users for search purposes. Framees embeddings are created for this collection.

payload_indexes.description: deterministic uuid creatred from: user_id + video_id + frame_number + frame_second
FK: oriane app user's random uuid

payload_data.description: path to the video in oriane-app/<user_id>/vid/<video_id>/<frame_number>_<frame_second>.png S3 bucket. TODO: change to CDN url once implemented
number of the frame extracted, starting from 1
